languages.text: {n}Рычание Ахиллеаса становится все громче. Сквозь хрипы и бульканье прорывается исполненный муки голос.{/n} "Боевые... стимуляторы... Слишком много... Мне нужна... бойня... Бойня. Бойня!" {n}Ваш бывший слуга балансирует на острие, норовя в любую секунду рухнуть в глубины кровавого безумия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Рычание Ахиллеаса становится все громче. Сквозь хрипы и бульканье прорывается исполненный муки голос.{/n} "Боевые... стимуляторы... Слишком много... Мне нужна... бойня... Бойня. Бойня!" {n}Ваш бывший слуга балансирует на острие, норовя в любую секунду рухнуть в глубины кровавого безумия.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Achilleas's growling becomes louder and louder. Through the rasping and gurgling, a tortured voice breaks through:{/n} "Combat... stimulants... Too many... I need... slaughter... Slaughter. Slaughter!" {n}Your former servant is teetering on a knife edge, threatening to tumble into bloodthirsty madness at any moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯的咆哮声变得越来越响。在嘶哑的喘息声中，他饱受折磨的声音高喊起来。{/n}“战斗……兴奋剂……太多了……我要……杀人……杀人。杀人！”{n}你这位曾经的仆人神智变得摇摆不定，随时可能会陷入嗜血的疯狂之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's growling becomes louder and louder. Through the rasping and gurgling, a tortured voice breaks through:{/n} "Combat... stimulants... Too many... I need... slaughter... Slaughter. Slaughter!" {n}Your former servant is teetering on a knife edge, threatening to tumble into bloodthirsty madness at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯的咆哮声变得越来越响。在嘶哑的喘息声中，他饱受折磨的声音高喊起来。{/n}“战斗……兴奋剂……太多了……我要……杀人……杀人。杀人！”{n}你这位曾经的仆人神智变得摇摆不定，随时可能会陷入嗜血的疯狂之中。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}La intensidad de los gruñidos de Achilleas no deja de aumentar. Entre jadeos y borboteos, surge una voz torturada:{/n} «Combate... estimulantes... Demasiados... Necesito... muerte... Muerte. ¡Muerte!». {n}Tu antiguo sirviente pende de un hilo muy delgado, amenazando con perderse en una locura sanguinaria en cualquier momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's growling becomes louder and louder. Through the rasping and gurgling, a tortured voice breaks through:{/n} "Combat... stimulants... Too many... I need... slaughter... Slaughter. Slaughter!" {n}Your former servant is teetering on a knife edge, threatening to tumble into bloodthirsty madness at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La intensidad de los gruñidos de Achilleas no deja de aumentar. Entre jadeos y borboteos, surge una voz torturada:{/n} «Combate... estimulantes... Demasiados... Necesito... muerte... Muerte. ¡Muerte!». {n}Tu antiguo sirviente pende de un hilo muy delgado, amenazando con perderse en una locura sanguinaria en cualquier momento.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}アキレアスのうなり声がどんどん激しくなる。かすり声と喉奥から鳴らされる音の中から、苦しげな声が発せられた。{/n}「戦闘…増強剤…多すぎる…殺戮せねば…殺戮。殺戮！」{n}かつての従者は、今にも血に飢えた狂気へと転落しそうな瀬戸際で揺れ動いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's growling becomes louder and louder. Through the rasping and gurgling, a tortured voice breaks through:{/n} "Combat... stimulants... Too many... I need... slaughter... Slaughter. Slaughter!" {n}Your former servant is teetering on a knife edge, threatening to tumble into bloodthirsty madness at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスのうなり声がどんどん激しくなる。かすり声と喉奥から鳴らされる音の中から、苦しげな声が発せられた。{/n}「戦闘…増強剤…多すぎる…殺戮せねば…殺戮。殺戮！」{n}かつての従者は、今にも血に飢えた狂気へと転落しそうな瀬戸際で揺れ動いている。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Achilleas' Knurren wird lauter und lauter. Eine gepeinigte Stimme durchbricht das Krächzen und Gurgeln:{/n} "Kampf...stimulanzien ... Zu viele ... Ich brauche ... Gemetzel ... Gemetzel. Gemetzel!" {n}Dein ehemaliger Diener taumelt auf des Messers Schneide und droht jeden Augenblick, in blutrünstigen Wahnsinn zu verfallen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's growling becomes louder and louder. Through the rasping and gurgling, a tortured voice breaks through:{/n} "Combat... stimulants... Too many... I need... slaughter... Slaughter. Slaughter!" {n}Your former servant is teetering on a knife edge, threatening to tumble into bloodthirsty madness at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas' Knurren wird lauter und lauter. Eine gepeinigte Stimme durchbricht das Krächzen und Gurgeln:{/n} "Kampf...stimulanzien ... Zu viele ... Ich brauche ... Gemetzel ... Gemetzel. Gemetzel!" {n}Dein ehemaliger Diener taumelt auf des Messers Schneide und droht jeden Augenblick, in blutrünstigen Wahnsinn zu verfallen.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Les grognements d'Achilleas gagnent en intensité. À travers les râles et les gargouillis, une voix torturée se fait entendre :{/n} « Trop de... stimulants... de combat... J'ai besoin... de sang... De sang. De sang ! » {n}Votre ancien serviteur vacille sur le fil du rasoir, menaçant de sombrer à tout moment dans une folie sanguinaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's growling becomes louder and louder. Through the rasping and gurgling, a tortured voice breaks through:{/n} "Combat... stimulants... Too many... I need... slaughter... Slaughter. Slaughter!" {n}Your former servant is teetering on a knife edge, threatening to tumble into bloodthirsty madness at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les grognements d'Achilleas gagnent en intensité. À travers les râles et les gargouillis, une voix torturée se fait entendre :{/n} « Trop de... stimulants... de combat... J'ai besoin... de sang... De sang. De sang ! » {n}Votre ancien serviteur vacille sur le fil du rasoir, menaçant de sombrer à tout moment dans une folie sanguinaire.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Achilleas'ın çıkardığı hırıltıların sesi gitgide artıyor. Kulak tırmalayan ve ıslak gürültülerin arasından, eziyet görmüş bir insan sesi duyuluyor.{/n} "Çok fazla... Çatışma... Uyarıcısı... Kan istiyorum... Kan. Kan!" {n}Eski hizmetkârının durumu pamuk ipliğine bağlı, her an delirip gözünü kan bürüyebilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's growling becomes louder and louder. Through the rasping and gurgling, a tortured voice breaks through:{/n} "Combat... stimulants... Too many... I need... slaughter... Slaughter. Slaughter!" {n}Your former servant is teetering on a knife edge, threatening to tumble into bloodthirsty madness at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas'ın çıkardığı hırıltıların sesi git gide artıyor. Kulak tırmalayan ve ıslak gürültülerin arasından, eziyet görmüş bir insan sesi duyuluyor.{/n} "Çok fazla... Çatışma... Uyarıcısı... Kan istiyorum... Kan. Kan!" {n}Eski hizmetkârın pamuk ipliğine bağlı; her an delirip gözünü kan bürüyebilir.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack
